text:
@narendramodi This is how #modi imposed lockdown. It seems the lockdown is only for the Muslim community. Karnataka CM attend a wedding on the second day of lockdown and the ministers in below tweet are from #Telangana #ModiResignNow #mpdiGoBack #COVID19 
https://t.co/rUu0vHRQGg
